text: Colomby-sur-Thaon is a former commune. It is in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Colomby-Anguerny.Arrêté préfectoral 30 September 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Colomby-sur-Thaon
